build-an-etherscan-service.title: Build an Etherscan service
build-an-etherscan-service.intro:
In this sharing, I will introduce the required APIs in Etherscan service, list some possible solutions, and compare those pros and cons. After that, illustrate our current design and future works. 

----
[Collaborative notes on HackMD](https://hackmd.io/c/coscup18-blockchain/%2Fcoscup18-blockchain-build-an-etherscan-service)
